title: Women?s Classic Loafers with Gold Metallic Buckle (10)
description:
SIZE  6 7 8 9 10 11                                                                                                                                                                                                           Step into effortless style and comfort with these elegant women?s loafers. Crafted with fine-quality material, they feature a soft inner cushion padding for all-day comfort and a non-slip rubber sole for stable walking. The gold metallic buckle adds a touch of luxury, while the super lightweight design (0.38 KG) ensures ease with every step. With a 3cm (1.2-inch) heel, these loafers perfectly balance comfort and sophistication?ideal for both casual and formal wear.

Color black
